libs.Hotspot.UDPP.functionApprox¶

This is the same than functionApprox but the input is the full cost function, not only the costVect vector.

Functions

fit_cost_curve(x, y, max_delay[, ...])

Can use 'L-BFGS-B' or 'Powell' for algo_fit, they seem to give the best results.
